mapper.select: SELECT JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, ERROR_DATETIME AS errorDatetime, CALLEE_REQ_DATE AS calleeReqDate, CALLEE_REQ_SEQ_NO AS calleeReqSeqNo, CALLEE_REQ_CHASU AS calleeReqChasu, CALLEE_CHASU_GUBUN AS calleeChasuGubun, CORNER_ARRIVAL_DATE AS cornerArrivalDate, CORNER_ARRIVAL_TIME AS cornerArrivalTime, REPAIR_DATETIME AS repairDatetime, TERMINAL_TYPE AS terminalType, ERROR_CONTENT AS errorContent, PENALTY_AMT AS penaltyAmt, NONE_PENALTY__ENABLE AS nonePenalty_enable, NONE_PENALTY_REASON AS nonePenaltyReason FROM ATMS_04001150

SELECT JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, ERROR_DATETIME AS errorDatetime, CALLEE_REQ_DATE AS calleeReqDate, CALLEE_REQ_SEQ_NO AS calleeReqSeqNo, CALLEE_REQ_CHASU AS calleeReqChasu, CALLEE_CHASU_GUBUN AS calleeChasuGubun, CORNER_ARRIVAL_DATE AS cornerArrivalDate, CORNER_ARRIVAL_TIME AS cornerArrivalTime, REPAIR_DATETIME AS repairDatetime, TERMINAL_TYPE AS terminalType, ERROR_CONTENT AS errorContent, PENALTY_AMT AS penaltyAmt, NONE_PENALTY__ENABLE AS nonePenalty_enable, NONE_PENALTY_REASON AS nonePenaltyReason FROM ATMS_04001150 WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, ERROR_DATETIME = #{errorDatetime}
mapper.update: DELETE FROM ATMS_04001150 WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, ERROR_DATETIME = #{errorDatetime}

UPDATE ATMS_04001150 SET JISA_CODE = #{jisaCode}, CORNER_NAME = #{cornerName}, CALLEE_REQ_DATE = #{calleeReqDate}, CALLEE_REQ_SEQ_NO = #{calleeReqSeqNo}, CALLEE_REQ_CHASU = #{calleeReqChasu}, CALLEE_CHASU_GUBUN = #{calleeChasuGubun}, CORNER_ARRIVAL_DATE = #{cornerArrivalDate}, CORNER_ARRIVAL_TIME = #{cornerArrivalTime}, REPAIR_DATETIME = #{repairDatetime}, TERMINAL_TYPE = #{terminalType}, ERROR_CONTENT = #{errorContent}, PENALTY_AMT = #{penaltyAmt}, NONE_PENALTY__ENABLE = #{nonePenalty_enable}, NONE_PENALTY_REASON = #{nonePenaltyReason} WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, ERROR_DATETIME = #{errorDatetime}

INSERT INTO ATMS_04001150 ( JISA_CODE, BRANCH_CODE, CORNER_CODE, TERMINAL_NO, CORNER_NAME, ERROR_DATETIME, CALLEE_REQ_DATE, CALLEE_REQ_SEQ_NO, CALLEE_REQ_CHASU, CALLEE_CHASU_GUBUN, CORNER_ARRIVAL_DATE, CORNER_ARRIVAL_TIME, REPAIR_DATETIME, TERMINAL_TYPE, ERROR_CONTENT, PENALTY_AMT, NONE_PENALTY__ENABLE, NONE_PENALTY_REASON ) VALUES ( #{jisaCode}, #{branchCode}, #{cornerCode}, #{terminalNo}, #{cornerName}, #{errorDatetime}, #{calleeReqDate}, #{calleeReqSeqNo}, #{calleeReqChasu}, #{calleeChasuGubun}, #{cornerArrivalDate}, #{cornerArrivalTime}, #{repairDatetime}, #{terminalType}, #{errorContent}, #{penaltyAmt}, #{nonePenalty_enable}, #{nonePenaltyReason} )
